verbs.description: Today the world [V: is] split into two sides . You ’re either celebrating with Israel or mourning with the Palestinians , as the Trump regime has officially established the US Embassy in Jerusalem . If it were ten years ago and I was still a Fundagelical Christian ( a term representing fundamental or evangelical Christianity ) , I would be celebrating today . …
